text: 28 Weeks Later is a 2007 post-apocalyptic horror movie directed by Juan Carlos Fresnadillo. It is a sequel to the 2002 movie 28 Days Later. It stars Robert Carlyle, Rose Byrne, Jeremy Renner, Harold Perrineau, Catherine McCormack, Mackintosh Muggleton, Imogen Poots, and Idris Elba. It is set after the events of the first movie, depicting the efforts of NATO military forces to create a safe zone in London, the consequence of two young siblings breaking the rules by leaving the save zone to find a photograph of their dead mother in their house, and the resulting reintroduction of the Rage virus into the safe zone. == Other websites == * * Category:2007 action movies Category:2007 horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:British action movies Category:British horror movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Zombie movies Category:Survival movies Category:Movies about viral outbreaks Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Paris Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:2000s English-language movies
